description.value:
Prerequisite: Half-orc, warlord, Combat Leader class feature

Benefit: Any ally who starts his or her turn within 5 squares of you gains a +2 feat bonus to his or her speed when charging until the end of that turn.

Update (4/13/2010)

Add "until the end of that turn" to the end of the Benefit entry.

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 140.
